steps.title: Welcome to Reselling Secrets Membership
steps.description:
{progress}

Hey {member.mention},

This is a quick walkthrough to make sure you are ready to take advantage of Reselling Secrets membership.

Click **Continue** after completing each step to move on.

_(You will not have full access to the server until completing these steps)_

steps.title: Step 1: View All Channels
steps.description:
{progress}

First, let's make sure you are able to view all of our channels.

To enable this, select Reselling Secrets at the top of the server, and make sure **"Show All Channels"** is toggled on.

_(Refer to video below for more direction)_

steps.title: Step 2: Notification Settings
steps.description:
{progress}

Next, let's make sure your notifications are set up!

Select Reselling Secrets > Notification Settings > Toggle `Only @mentions`.

This prevents notification spam while keeping you informed.

_(Refer to video below for more direction)_

steps.title: Step 3: Getting Support
steps.description:
{progress}
